text: Super Bowl XLI (Super Bowl 41) was an American football game played between the American Football Conference (AFC) champion Indianapolis Colts and the National Football Conference (NFC) champion Chicago Bears to choose the National Football League (NFL) champion for the 2006 season. The Colts beat the Bears by the score of 29â€“17. The game was played on February 4, 2007, at Dolphin Stadium in Miami Gardens, Florida. ==References== *041 Category:2007 in sports Category:2007 in the United States Category:Chicago Bears Category:Indianapolis Colts Category:Sports in Florida
title: Super Bowl XLI
